games.title: TRAFFIC JAM ESCAPE 3D
games.description:
Clear the roads in Traffic Jam Escape 3D! Solve challenging traffic puzzles, free cars from gridlock, and master the art of strategic driving.

Get ready to play Traffic Jam Escape 3D, the addictive mobile traffic puzzle game where you control chaotic city streets and free cars from gridlock! Every second counts - one smart move can clear the road, one mistake can block it forever. Are you skilled enough to guide every car out of the jam?

In Traffic Jam Escape 3D, your goal is simple but challenging: tap cars, follow the arrows, and plan their path to freedom. Avoid collisions, dodge obstacles, and keep traffic moving smoothly. With each level, timing and strategy become even more important - one wrong move could create a crash and block the way.

Every stage offers a brand-new challenge. You‚Äôll need to think ahead, plan the order of moves, and figure out the best escape route for each vehicle. From narrow alleys to busy intersections, the puzzles get tougher and more exciting as you progress.

Featuring a wide variety of vehicles - from tiny cars to large trucks - you‚Äôll need to adapt your strategy to guide each one safely out of the mess. The more you play, the sharper your skills become as you conquer increasingly complex traffic jams.

Key Features of Traffic Jam Escape 3D:
Challenging traffic jam escape puzzles at every level
Intuitive tap-and-guide controls for all ages
Dynamic gameplay with busy intersections, narrow roads, and tricky obstacles
Dozens of levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked
Vibrant graphics and realistic sound effects for an immersive experience
Traffic Jam Escape isn‚Äôt just about clearing the streets‚Äîit‚Äôs about mastering the art of smart maneuvering. Dodge oncoming traffic, weave through tight spaces, and avoid obstacles at every turn. With dozens of levels to conquer, the game offers a constant challenge and endless fun.

Whether you‚Äôre solving quick car escape puzzles on the go or tackling more complex jam-packed streets at home, Traffic Jam Escape 3D delivers nonstop excitement and tests your problem-solving skills.

Ready to test your reflexes and strategic thinking? Take the driver‚Äôs seat in Traffic Jam Escape 3D today and see if you can clear the roads and guide every car to safety. Play now and experience the thrill of escaping the traffic jams!

games.title: Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House

Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House is a dark point-and-click adventure available on both web and Android.

You wake up in a locked, unfamiliar house. The windows are sealed, the doors are bolted, and it doesn‚Äôt take long to realize you‚Äôre not here by choice ‚Äî you‚Äôve been kidnapped. The only way forward is to explore, uncover clues, and piece together who lives here‚Ä¶ and why they‚Äôve trapped you.

Every object can hide a secret: a sofa may conceal something beneath its cushions, a flowerpot may hold a key, or a book on the shelf may reveal disturbing truths about the strange girl who owns this place. Interacting with the environment unlocks new paths, changes the protagonist‚Äôs perception, and pushes the story into darker territory.

As in every classic point-and-click adventure, you‚Äôll collect items and use them in clever ways to solve puzzles, repair devices, and access new rooms. A simple glass of water, a sharp knife, or a roll of tape could be the difference between staying trapped forever and finding your way to freedom.

The narrative unfolds gradually, shifting from calm exploration to mounting dread. What begins as a harmless search of a living room turns into a chilling discovery of obsessions, sinister secrets, and unsettling mannequins that seem far too lifelike.

Your ultimate goal is clear: escape the house before it‚Äôs too late. But as you progress, you‚Äôll uncover more about the girl‚Äôs twisted hobbies ‚Äî and the terrifying fate that might await you if you fail.

Will you outsmart her and unlock the final door to freedom, or become just another part of her dark collection?

As the most relaxing and addictive color sorting game, this ball puzzle is designed to entertain and sharpen your mind at the same time. While sorting the colored balls to fill each bottle with the same color, the relaxation it brings will relieve stress and distract you from your daily worries.

This classic color sorting game is pretty simple to play, but hard to master. However, there are thousands of puzzles of varying difficulty. The more challenging the puzzles you play, the more careful you need to be with each move. When balls of the same color are sorted into a single bottle, you win!
Each bottle can only be placed with 4 balls.
Use "Undo" to go back to previous steps.
Add an extra bottle if you get stuck.
You can restart the current level at any time.

games.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you‚Äôll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You‚Äôll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.

games.title: The Road Home: Granny Escape
games.description:
The Road Home: Granny Escape is a terrifying 3D horror survival game where your only goal is to escape a haunted house filled with danger, puzzles, and fear. You're not here by accident ‚Äî Granny and Grandpa brought you here on purpose, and they won‚Äôt let you go easily.

üïØ The Story
Your trip home took a dark turn. While riding a bus through a remote forest, a massive tree crashed down onto the road. You stepped out to investigate‚Ä¶ and everything went black.

You wake up in a locked, eerie house. The windows are boarded up. The doors are sealed. And something is watching you. You soon realize the terrifying truth: you‚Äôve been kidnapped and trapped by an evil Granny and her mad husband.

This isn‚Äôt just a place ‚Äî it‚Äôs a prison designed to break you.

üéØ What You Must Do
-Explore the dark and haunted house
-Solve puzzles and unlock secret passages
-Craft useful items from the resources you find
-Avoid Granny and Grandpa ‚Äî they can hear your every move
-Survive deadly traps and unpredictable chases
-Make your way to freedom before it‚Äôs too late

‚öôÔ∏è Game Features
-A chilling 3D horror experience with immersive atmosphere
-Evil and intelligent enemies who react to sound and movement
-Multiple escape paths and secret endings
-A full crafting system: collect, combine, survive
-Puzzles, keys, locked rooms, and hidden objects
-A heavy dose of mental horror and psychological tension
-Every sound matters. Every choice counts.

‚ùóÔ∏è Not Just a Game ‚Äî A Nightmare
This isn‚Äôt just a scary house ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living nightmare. There‚Äôs evil in the walls, and death behind every corner. Will you outsmart your captors, or will fear consume you?

Use your brain, stay quiet, and find your way out‚Ä¶ if you still can.

Download The Road Home: Granny Escape ‚Äî and see if you have what it takes to survive the fear, escape the madness, and get back home.

games.title: Fruitsland: Escape from the Amusement Park
games.description:
Welcome to Fruitsland ‚Äì a unique amusement park where fun awaits at every turn! Colorful carousels, exciting rides, and entertainers dressed as fruits ‚Äì apples, bananas, watermelons, and oranges ‚Äì fill the park. Children‚Äôs laughter fills the air, as school groups with teachers and families with kids flock to enjoy the day. Everything seems perfect, but not all is as it seems... One careless step, and you fall through an old hatch, landing in a spooky, long-abandoned part of the park hidden underground.

Before you lies a chilling, forgotten underground park where strange scientific experiments were once conducted. Only remnants of these experiments remain now, with crumbling rides and deserted game rooms that carry no joy. An eerie silence surrounds you, broken only by the sounds of old machinery and the shuffling of mysterious creatures. The first location is themed around apples ‚Äì at first, it seems harmless, but soon you realize you‚Äôre trapped. As you study the remnants of the scientists‚Äô journals, you uncover their plans to bring fruit to life, fruit that would entertain visitors around the clock. The sinister plan of the park‚Äôs owner aimed to turn fruits into real entertainers, capable of anything to amuse guests.

Your mission now is to escape from this underground horror. Every step brings new puzzles, challenging tasks, and deadly monsters that lurk around every corner, the results of failed experiments. Surviving here won‚Äôt be easy: these animated fruits have come to life, and now they‚Äôre hunting you. Every corner is a new survival test filled with horror, fear, and adrenaline. Choose your path wisely, solve puzzles to find your way out, and avoid deadly traps and monsters that only look like harmless fruits.

The first monster you will encounter is a blind apple, a nightmare resembling a zombie. It aimlessly roams the empty sections of the park, filling everyone who sees it with dread.

The second section is dedicated to the banana. This is the second colorful monster brought to life by horrifying experiments. Seeing it makes you feel as if something is invading your mind.

The third section of the underground park is dedicated to the Pomegranate ‚Äî a sinister fruit with two large eyes. These roaming eyes not only track unwelcome guests but also attack them. They emerge from their sockets and move independently, chasing their target across the area.

Can you escape from this park and see the sunlight again? Will you find a way to break free from the gloomy underground? This horror game is for those ready for survival, monster hunts, immersion in fear, and adrenaline! Complete quests, solve puzzles, defeat monsters, and find freedom while uncovering the mysteries of Fruitsland.

Download this game to dive into the fruit garden‚Ä¶ if you dare!

games.title: Queens Royal: Sudoku Puzzle
games.description:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision!

Queens Royal reimagines the classic eight queens logic puzzle into a modern masterpiece, where elegance meets relentless brain-teasing challenges. Place your queens wisely, strategize every move, and conquer 5,000+ levels of mind-bending puzzles designed to test your intellect and crown you the ultimate ruler of logic!

Why Queen Royal Will Captivate You
- Brain-Training Excellence: Sharpen logic, strategy, and problem-solving skills with puzzles that evolve in complexity.
- Sleek & Serene Design: Minimalistic visuals and soothing colors keep your focus on the challenge, not clutter.
- Daily Reign Challenges: Fresh puzzles and timed events with endless variety.

Features Fit for a Monarch
- 5,000+ Levels: From gentle warm-ups to expert-tier enigmas, every puzzle is a new conquest.
- Smart Hints: Stuck? Use hints to nudge your strategy without spoiling the thrill.
- Endless Mode: Infinite levels mode lets you relax and strategize stress-free.
- Elegant Tutorials: Learn the rules in seconds‚Äîmastery takes a lifetime.

A Puzzle Game That Earns Your Crown
Easy to learn, impossible to put down. Queen Royal is the perfect blend of simplicity and obsession. Whether you‚Äôre a chess pro, a sudoku savant, or a casual gamer seeking a mental spark, Queen Royal offers a regal challenge that grows with you. Outthink the grid, outmaneuver the rules, and reign supreme in a world where every victory feels legendary.
games.howToPlayText:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision! In this elegant brain-teaser, your logic and strategy will be tested as you place your queens to conquer the board. With thousands of mind-bending puzzles, each move counts on your path to becoming the ultimate ruler of logic!

Game Objective:
 - The goal is to place one queen in every row, column, and color-designated zone on the grid.

Rules:
 - One Queen Per Realm: You must place exactly one queen in each row, column, and color zone.
 - No Touching Crowns: Queens cannot be placed in squares that touch each other, including diagonally.
 - Unique Solution: Every level is designed to have only one correct solution, so no guessing is required!

games.howToPlayText: To play 4 color card game on a desktop, use your mouse to interact with the cards. Your hand appears at the bottom of the screen. To play a card, move your cursor over a matching card and left-click it to place it on the discard pile. If no cards match, click the draw pile to get a new card. Immerse yourself in Flag Jam, a unique blend of puzzle-solving, flags collecting, and visual ASMR effects! Tap to match banner pieces, watch them glide smoothly into place, and clear the board as you complete each flag. üó∫Ô∏è Complete Flags to Progress: Each level challenges you to complete flags by finding and matching all the correct pieces.

games.description: Dudes, this is a very short strategic card battle game that blends tactical gameplay with quirky humor and vibrant creativity. What sets this game apart is its dynamic terrain system‚Äîeach battlefield zone corresponds to specific card types, favoring attackers, healers, defenders, or versatile "special units" that can be placed anywhere! With customizable decks and deep strategic options, players must outwit their opponents to claim victory. games.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Deck Building: Before starting a match, create your deck using cards you‚Äôve collected. Customize your deck based on strategy‚Äîfocus on attack-heavy units, healing abilities, or powerful spells. 
‚Ä¢ Terrain Zones: At the start of the game, choose which terrains to place on your side of the board. Each terrain type allows only certain creatures to be summoned there, except Rainbow Creatures, which are flexible. Terrain types:
- Cornfields: Strong attackers.
- Sandlands: Defensive powerhouses.
- Blue Plains: Balanced but unpredictable.
- Candy Kingdom: Weak but great at healing allies.
- Useless Swamp: Special ability users or direct-damage dealers.
‚Ä¢ Turn-Based Mechanics: On your turn, draw cards, spend resources (Magic Points), and deploy creatures, buildings, or spells onto the field. Attack enemy creatures or target their towers directly when possible. 
‚Ä¢ Winning Conditions: Outlast your opponent by maintaining stronger forces, controlling key areas, and dealing consistent damage.

games.title: Mini Golf Battle
games.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.

games.title: Animal Merge
games.description:
Objective: Merge animal bubbles to create upgraded animals and ultimately achieve the final objective by collecting fully developed animals.
Gameplay Instructions:
Launching the Animal Bubbles:
Tap on an animal bubble to select it.
Drag the bubble backward to aim.
Release to launch the bubble in the opposite direction.
Merging Animal Bubbles:
When two identical animal bubbles collide, they merge to create an upgraded version.
Continue merging bubbles of the same type to progress.
Achieving the Objective:
Merge two basic-level animal bubbles to form an intermediate-level animal.
Merge intermediate-level animal bubbles to create the final full-fledged animal.
Once the final animal is created, it is automatically collected as part of the level objective.
Winning the Level:
The level is completed when you have successfully created and collected the required number of final animals.

games.description: Experience the excitement of Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive, a dynamic game where you merge items to craft powerful tools and potions. Test your strategy as you navigate dungeons. Play for free online on both mobile and desktop. Embrace your heroic side!
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons.

Merging Items 
In the lower part of the screen, you will find the merging grid. This is where you combine different items to gain various effects:
- Weapons: Merge different weapon parts to create powerful weapons that deal damage to enemies.
- Potions: Combine potions to restore health and boost your survivability.
- Keys: Merge keys to unlock chests scattered throughout the dungeon, which contain valuable loot.
- Coin Pouches: Collect and merge coin pouches to purchase new items from the shop and expand your inventory by buying travel bags from the merchant.

Dungeon Exploration 
In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon. 

Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!

games.title: Cup Quest
games.description:
Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey: A Feline Hero‚Äôs Adventure Begins!

Join a brave cat on an epic quest in Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey, a fresh twist on the classic balls-and-cups game. This isn't just about tossing balls into cups‚Äîit's a full-blown adventure packed with clever puzzles, physics-based challenges, and one courageous kitty determined to save the day.

Your Cat, the Hero
Meet your furry champion‚Äîa quick-thinking, nimble cat with a heart of gold. As danger looms and traps lie in wait, it‚Äôs up to this whiskered warrior to take on wild levels filled with spinning platforms, explosives, and tricky obstacles.

Precision Meets Puzzle
Each level is a test of aim and timing. Launch the ball just right, bounce it off the environment, and land it perfectly in the cup. It‚Äôs not just about power‚Äîsuccess requires strategy, finesse, and a little creative thinking.
 What Awaits You
- Over 200 unique levels, ranging from simple to seriously tricky
- Skill-based gameplay that mixes timing, puzzle-solving, and action
- Hero upgrades: unlock new feline champions and grow stronger as you progress
- Satisfying animations and smooth physics that make every throw feel great
- Enemies and traps: it's not just puzzles‚Äîyou‚Äôll have to outsmart swarm enemies too

games.title: Run The Electricity
games.description:
Run The Electricity is a unique puzzle game that combines simplicity and benefits for your mind. It is designed to give relaxation, help to cope with stress and improve concentration.

Instead of intense gameplay and a race against time, a calm process awaits you here: you just need to connect lines, lamps and energy sources in a closed circuit to turn on the light.

Minimalistic design, smooth animation and soothing music create an atmosphere of complete tranquility comparable to yoga. This is not just a game, but a means to meditate and combat anxiety. You can play it at home, on the road, or at work to distract yourself and restore your mental balance.

Smart puzzles train logic and imagination, and simple mechanics allow you to have fun from the first seconds. Discover a world of light, harmony and tranquility!
games.howToPlayText:
Playing this game is easy and enjoyable. All you need to do is tap on the lines and turn them until you get a closed electrical circuit.

For the light to come on, at least one lamp and a wire must be connected in it. As soon as this happens, the lines will shine, and you will get a feeling of completeness and tranquility.

Each puzzle takes only a few seconds, but it brings a lot of fun. This makes the game ideal for short pauses, trips, or waiting. You don't have to rush: the levels are unlimited in time, and you can solve them at your own pace.

With each new stage, the tasks become more interesting and diverse, training concentration and attention. Conduct Electricity will help to cope with anxiety, give positive emotions and become an excellent anti-stress remedy. Just open the game, start connecting the lines, and feel your mind calm down.

games.title: Bubble Tower
games.description:
Bubble Tower 3D is a relaxing 3D bubble-pop / color-match puzzle game.
You rotate a tower (or cylinder) loaded with colored bubbles around its vertical axis.
Your goal is to shoot bubbles, matching colors to connect groups of the same color. When matched, those bubbles pop/drop off the tower.
There are many levels; difficulty increases as you go. More bubble colors, trickier arrangements, limited shots, etc.
Also there are diamonds or special gems you can collect in certain levels. These may unlock ‚Äúshiny shapes‚Äù or cosmetic things.
The graphics are clean, simple, and meant for relaxing casual play. It mixes mental challenge (where to shoot, color matching) with a soothing visual.
games.howToPlayText:
A tower appears with a cluster of bubbles of various colors. There‚Äôs a shooter that holds the next bubble to fire.
You can rotate the tower around (usually by dragging left/right or using onscreen controls) to bring bubbles of matching color in position.
Tap or drag to aim, then let go (or tap a location) to shoot the bubble toward the tower. Match it with other bubbles of the same color.
When you connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color, those bubbles pop/drop off. Bubbles that are hanging (i.e. no longer connected to the base or other bubbles) also fall off.
Some levels include diamonds or special gems placed in certain parts of the bubble structure. You need to target those, maybe by matching bubbles around them or popping surrounding bubbles to let them fall.
You win a level if all bubbles (or the required ones) are cleared. If you run out of shots (or fail to clear the required bubbles), you lose and must retry.

games.title: Connect Line
games.description:
Connect Lines is a puzzle game in which the goal is to rotate line-segments so that together they form a continuous connected path or network i.e. all the lines must join up into one single connected structure.
It is simple in appearance but grows challenging, because you must figure out the correct orientation of each piece so that the network is complete without any breaks.
As the puzzle advances, the arrangement / layout becomes more complex. The number of line-pieces increases, the shapes become more varied, and finding the correct connection scheme becomes harder. You may need to think ahead about how rotating one piece will affect connections with several adjacent pieces. (This is standard for these kinds of puzzles.)
games.howToPlayText:
Connect all lines into one unified path (or network). Every piece must be connected properly so there are no loose ends.
The board has many small line segments. These might be straight lines, curves, etc. Each segment is oriented in some way.
You can click on a line piece to rotate it. Each click usually rotates the piece by 90¬∞ (or possibly another fixed amount) to change its orientation.

games.title: Rotate Cups
games.description:
This is a rotation physics puzzle game where you control the angle of cups to try to get the balls to roll into specific cups.
Rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise as needed to turn the clear cups into ramps guiding the ball down the level.
Place at least one ball in each of the blue cups.
In this game you have to get all the balls into the blue cups lower down the screen.
Larger blue cups can hold more than one ball in them.
If there are multiple smaller blue cups you must get a ball into each of them.
Levels are not timed & you can both rotate as many times as you like & pause as many times as you like.

You can skip intermediary cups. On most levels you typically want to use all the cups on the way down, but if you are struggling to do so you can bump a ball off the outside of a cup or skip a cup entirely & it won‚Äôt harm you in the least provided your balls eventually get into the blue cups.
Some levels have a long reach you have to make the ball roll. On those levels sometimes a somewhat rapid cup spin toward the destination is enough, but in some cases you have to do that rapid spin as the starting point & then slightly spin back quickly right as the ball is leaving to give the ball a bit more lift.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Use your mouse left click button to select on the screen & drag your mouse to rotate the cups.
Drag left or down to spin clockwise.
Drag right or up to spin counterclockwise.

Touchscreen devices:
Tap the screen with a finger & drag your finger across the screen to rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise.

games.title: Number Sums
games.description:
Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental math. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row, column, and colored region be equal to the clues on the side of the board and inside the colored regions. Practice your math skills and logic with Number Sums!

Each row, column, and region has its own solution, but the goal of this math game with numbers is to make them all work at the same time. You have to circle the correct numbers and erase the numbers you don't need. Remember, the sums of the numbers in rows, columns and colored regions should be equal to the numbers on the sides of the board and inside each region. Each level of this numbers game has only one solution, try to find it to solve educational math puzzles!

Mental arithmetic is an invaluable math skill for your everyday life. Inside Number Sums you'll find math puzzles of various difficulty. The mechanics of these math riddles sounds simple but requires a lot of thinking. Playing sum number games and solving math problems can improve your arithmetic skills. If you are interested in number puzzles or math games for adults, and in training your addition skills, play this engaging number game for hours of fun!
games.howToPlayText:
- Circle the correct numbers that add up to the values on the sides of the rows, columns and regions.
- Use the toggle to switch between circling and erasing modes. It will help you to mark the correct numbers and the extra numbers that you don't need.
- Each level of these math puzzles has only one possible solution, so make sure that the rows, columns and colored regions work together at the same time.
- Train your math skills with this free number puzzle with various levels of difficulty. Open different types of board from 3x3 to 10x10.

Experience one of the most addictive, color-filled puzzle game ‚Äî Color Roll 3D! Think you've got a keen eye for details? Ready to challenge your brain? Then this color game is just for you! It's all about color, creativity, and some serious agility!

In Color Roll 3D, you'll need to copy the exact image you're shown, down to the last detail! How? Just by unrolling and arranging the vibrantly colored rolls the puzzle game give you for each level. Sounds easy, right? But wait, there's a catch! You've got to ensure the colors overlap in just the right way to perfectly match the image.

The challenge comes from getting the direction and position of each roll correct. If you unroll a roll the wrong way, or overlay in the wrong spot, the final image will look different from the target.

Draw a line with your finger, release it, and watch it bounce around the screen. If your move is right, the line will hit and remove every object until the screen is empty. Sounds easy? As levels go up, the puzzles get smarter, requiring perfect angles, timing, and logic.

You draw a line (with your finger / touch) starting from somewhere, and that line interacts with the elements on screen.
The drawn line will ‚Äúpop‚Äù or hit the elements, making them disappear (‚Äúclear all the elements‚Äù) if done correctly.
There are many levels, increasingly challenging.
Some puzzles are simple; others require more precise dragging, angles, and timing.

games.title: Unravel Eggs Puzzle
games.description: Celebrate Easter weekend in style this year with the sweet new puzzle game, Unravel Eggs Puzzle! Complete each level by untangling eggs such that each line connecting eggs is not intersected by any other line connecting eggs. Warm up with some light puzzles and work your way up to an egg-tangling like you've never seen! Happy Easter!
games.howToPlayText:
Grab an egg:
Touch and drag an egg to move it around the screen.

Reposition to avoid intersections:
Adjust positions so that none of the connecting lines between eggs cross each other. All lines must be ‚Äúuntangled.‚Äù

Change color to green:
When the arrangement has no intersecting lines, the eggs and the lines turn green, meaning the level is solved.

games.title: TENKYU BALL
games.description: TENKYU BALL is a 3D casual ball-rolling puzzle game where you must guide a ball through tilting stages to reach the goal. The environment is minimalistic, and the challenge comes from balancing control vs risk. As you tilt the stage more, the ball moves faster, but there‚Äôs danger: if you tilt too much, the ball may fall off and you'll fail the level.
games.howToPlayText:
Tilt the stage / swipe finger:
You swipe (or drag) on your screen to tilt the surface on which the ball rests.
The tilt direction determines where the ball rolls.
Control carefully:
If you tilt too much, the ball gains speed and can fall off the edge.
Tilt only as much as needed to navigate turns, avoid gaps, and make tricky maneuvers.
Reach the goal:
Each stage has a goal point or exit you must reach. Successfully get the ball there without falling off.
Failure and retry:
If the ball falls, the level ends (you lose) and you‚Äôll need to restart that stage.

games.title: Telekinetic Pumpkin
games.description:
Telekinetic Pumpkin is an arcade game where an experiment aimed at creating a magnificent, oversized pumpkin for Halloween takes an unexpected turn, resulting in the creation of a telekinetic pumpkin.


You‚Äôre a Pumpkin that teleports and moves objects with its mind! Destroy drones by smashing them, and collect power-ups to stay alive. Select your upgrades and try to survive as long as possible.
games.howToPlayText: Double-click on a location to teleport. Click and drag anything to move it with your mind (boxes, enemies, or power-ups). Every 35 seconds, you can select a random upgrade or ability to help you survive longer.

games.title: Toytopia
games.description: Toytopia is a cozy merge game where you are tasked to combine and produce art materials which you can use to fix broken toys. Each toy presents a unique challenge and difficulty.
games.howToPlayText: In Toytopia, you simply need to fix the broken parts of a toy by merging art items to produce the required art materials. Use the mouse cursor (desktop) or finger (mobile) to drag and drop items on the board.

games.title: Screw Match
games.description: Screw Match - Nuts and Bolts. Your task is to put screws of different colors on the glass nut to the box on the top with the same color as the screws. If the nut holes on the box are full, you will be replaced by a new box.
games.howToPlayText: Put screws of different colors on the glass nut to the box on the top with the same color as the screws
